cultural practices: 文化实践；栽培技术
","sentences":"the very real historical and cultural differences between our two societies
^^我们两个社会之间非常现实的历史和文化差异^^
the desire to maintain a distinct cultural identity
^^保持独特的文化特征的愿望^^
It is important to look at the political and cultural context in which the novel was written.
^^要考虑小说创作时的政治和文化背景，这一点很重要。^^
people who share the same cultural background
^^有着相同文化背景的人^^
","relWords":"adj.
cultured: 有教养的；人工培养的；讲究的

adv.

n.
culture: 文化，文明；修养；栽培

v.

vt.
culture: [细胞][微] 培养（等于cultivate）

","synos":"adj.
文化的；教养的：nonmaterial

green dragon: [植]绿龙
dragon ball: 七龙珠（动画片）

","sentences":"She worked a dragon on the new linen cloth.
^^她在新的亚麻布上绣了条龙。^^
","synos":"n.

","usphone":"swɪft","remMethod":"电梯 (lift) 因改加成sw而变得敏捷 (swift)","phrases":"taylor swift: 泰勒·斯威夫特（乡村女歌手）

","sentences":"My letter received a swift reply.
^^我的信很快就得到了回复。^^
She shot a swift glance at Paul.
^^她迅速瞥了保罗一眼。^^
","relWords":"adv.
swiftly: 很快地；敏捷地；即刻

n.

","synos":"adj.

","sentences":"They are both blonde, but there the similarity ends .

","usphone":"'æθɪnz","sentences":"The best thing for me is that I have equaled what I have done at Athens.
^^对我来说，最好的事情是，我取得了在雅典曾经取得过的成绩。^^
If you’re on a cruise through the Mediterranean, you might only have one day in Athens.
^^假如你在一个穿越地中海的乘船观光团上，你就大概只能在雅典呆一天。^^
The differences between Athens and Washington seem to be very far.
^^雅典与华盛顿特区的差别,似乎非常遥远。^^

^^欧文斯进来控制了局面。^^

^^他们每周至少沟通一次，而此时在亚特兰大还是下午晚些时候。^^
"},"$:/PEPGaoZhong_2/amber_11":{"title":"$:/PEPGaoZhong_2/amber_11","word":"amber","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-PEPGaoZhong_2/Word}}","created":"20220405060758918","transCn":"n. 琥珀色；琥珀

","sentences":"He was always criticising his wife’s appearance.
